Class OnceUxEventListener

java.lang.Object
  com.brightcove.plugin.onceux.event.OnceUxEventListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
AdDataReadyEventHandler, EndAdBreakEventHandler, ProgressEventHandler, SendImpressionEventHandler, SendTrackingBeaconEventHandler, StartAdBreakEventHandler
public abstract class OnceUxEventListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements EventListener

Provide a base class for all OnceUX event handlers. See @link() for details about Android progress events.

Field Summary
protected  EventEmitter eventEmitter
          The event emitter to use for triggering OnceUX events, such as starting and ending ad breaks.
